title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 April 2009 - XWiki
content:
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:20): test  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:21): news  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:22): Logging works again: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20090416  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:28): test  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:29): sdumitriu: xwikibot has some "commands"?  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:36): tachirei: Yes  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:36): Wait a bit  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:36): I'm still debugging it  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 18:40sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:41): Testing...  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 18:42  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:42): help  
sdumitriu is now known as test1 ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
test1 is now known as sdumitriu ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
sdumitriu left #xwiki at 18:44  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 18:44  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:44): OK, the logging part works  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:44): And it works better than before  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:44): And you can even try to talk to the bot:  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:44): /msg xwikibot Hello  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:45): search something  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:45): search xwiki  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:45): XWIKI-123  
marta\_ - (16/04/2009 18:45): :)  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:46): jira XOFFICE-82  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:46): I guess the xmlrpc connector is disabled  
lucaa left #xwiki at 18:46  
arunreddy - (16/04/2009 18:47):  This is weird "Please don't talk to me, I'm just a robot."  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:47): well.. http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/rpc/xmlrpc it's not loading ...  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:47): :))  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:48): arunreddy: interested in talking with robots? :P  
arunreddy - (16/04/2009 18:48): Yes   
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:49): well... I guess we should make xwikibot pass the Turing Test :)) ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turing\_Test )  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:51): xipe: Are you here?  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:52): vmassol: Any idea why doesn't our Jira accept xmlrpc?  
tachirei - (16/04/2009 18:52): sdumitriu: "- jira <text> : search JIRA issues for the specified text and prints the top 5 results" - so it prints the results? or only number of results? :-?  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:52): I don't know  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:52): I forgot  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:53): sendMessage(channel, issue.getKey() + " - " + issue.getSummary() + " - " + issue.getLink());  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:54): So it should print something like:  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:54): XWIKI-123 - Bug when doing something - http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-123  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:54): news  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 18:56  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:56): news  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 18:58  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:58): Why doesn't Jira accept xmlrpc connections?  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:58): news  
xipe - (16/04/2009 18:58): I don't know  
xipe - (16/04/2009 18:59): Are you sure it's not working ? How did you try ?  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 18:59): Look at this:  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:00): xwiki-123  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:00): XWIKI-123  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:00): So there's this input stream error  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:00): And if I open the URL, after a while Skol appears  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:01): The same kind of URL works for apache, for example: https://issues.apache.org/jira/rpc/xmlrpc  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:01): It seems it's enabled in the configuration  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:01): Let's try to restart jira  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:03  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:03): news  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:05): Is it ok now ?  
evalica joined #xwiki at 19:05  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:07): Let me check  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:07): XWIKI-123  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:07): Nope  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:07): here it seems to work  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:07): I can't open the URL either  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:07): using python I can login  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:09): Indeed, it works  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:10): I just created XWPLT-147 using python + xmlrpclib  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:10): I think your tool is not working  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:10): Yes, looks like it  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:11): Can you check if the jira swizzle plugin is enabled for xwiki.org?  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:11): yes it is  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:11): Yes, otherwise it would fail sooner, not when trying to connect  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:13  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:13): news  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:13): It seems like it's because your are trying to acces jira from the internal network  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:14): the jira front-end webserver is not configured to get jira connections from the local network  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:15): OK  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:15): you should connect to : jira.xwiki.org:8080 from the internal network  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:15): and it should work  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:16): so the same URL, but a different port ;)  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:17  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:17): news  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:17): XWIKI-123  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:18): Thanks xipe, it seems to work  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:18): XWPLT-146  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:18): No, it only works for XWIKI-  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:18): just checking .. ;)  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:19): I can make it work for anything like X(something uppercase)-(numbers)  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:19): I'll have to see if it can see our private projects  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:19): No, I think it's better to make it work only for XWIKI-?  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:20): XWIKI-1678  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:20): ok, great  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:20): Yes, that's good  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:20): yep  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:21): But the message should be nicer...  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:21): yes  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:21): XWIKI-9999  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:21): Hm, it's always RemotePermissionException  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:23): XWIKI-3148  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:23  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:23): Now you should code a roulette mode  
sdumitriu - (16/04/2009 19:24): XWIKI-9999  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:24): like if you type  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:24): !roulette XWIKI  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:24): it gives you an open issue from the xwiki project using a random bug id  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:24): and the you have to fix it ;)  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:25): with a mapping between irc nick and jira user  
xipe - (16/04/2009 19:25): the bot puts you as asignee for the random issue you got  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:26
